thread.title: Coronation Street Spoilers: It's bad news for Ken Barlow as his family react with fury
thread.title_full: Coronation Street Spoilers: It's bad news for Ken Barlow as his family react with fury

author: Jennifer Rodger
title: Coronation Street Spoilers: It's bad news for Ken Barlow as his family react with fury
text:
Ken Barlow has a shocking week (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Life will never be the same again for Ken Barlow as his family take out their fury on him week in Coronation Street this week. 
His son Peter is heartbroken as he sees Toyah leave the Street with her ex Toby. 
He takes his anger out on Ken, who had believed Chloe’s lies about Peter, and is tempted to hit the bottle. Toyah has left Peter who hits rock bottom (Photo: ITV) 
Meanwhile, Ken's grandson Adam is back... but he’s in hiding. And will son Daniel learn how Ken's meddling led Sinead to terminate their baby? Wedding bells! Rosie and Sophie learn of their dad's money troubles (Photo: ITV) 
Elsewhere, Rosie and Sophie overhear Kevin admitting to Anna that he might not be able to pay the mortgage this month, they realise the impact of their mistakes on his finances. 
Rosie accepts a glamour job intending to hand the fee to her dad. But when Kevin hears about her plan, he tries to stop his eldest daughter going back down that career path. 
Elsewhere, Sally is devastated when a mammogram shows her cancer has returned, and breaks the news to Tim. But then she finds out it’s all a nasty prank – she HASN’T got cancer. Who is her stalker, and how much more can she take? 
Meanwhile, Fiz gives stressed-out Alya a massage. When Sean points out how much masseurs charge, it gives her an idea for a new career. 
Coronation Street is on Mon, Wed & Fri, ITV Like us on Facebook
